input.sentences: i have always wanted to ride a ferris wheel .
i got the opportunity this spring to finally go on one .
as i looked up i got a bit fearful .
in my mind i thought i was going to get dizzy like i was on a fast ride .
it felt like i was on a ride that kept spinning and spinning .
output.sentences: It was her favorite place in the world besides the mountains.
The Ferris wheel stood out against the blue of the sky and the river.
She looked up and watched as the wheel began it's spin.
Faster and faster it whirled until she got dizzy watching it.
All the rides were fun but the Ferris wheel was always the best for her.
